protocol.name: P-GSE53989-1
protocol.text: Raw microarray data were analyzed using the Affymetrix Program Suite Expression Console v1.1 (www.affymetrix.com/analysis/). A gene expression model was obtained from normalized CEL intensities based on a perfect match only model (RMA). The RMA algorithm used a robust multi-array average for background adjustment, normalization, and log2 transformation of signal intensities. ID_REF =  VALUE = Log2 RMA signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE53989-2
protocol.text: After 14 days, plants were transferred on Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium supplemented with 0 mg/L, 40 mg/L or 80 mg/L CdS QDs, for other 21 days at 24°C, a relative humidity of 30% and under a 16 h photoperiod.

protocol.name: P-GSE53989-3
protocol.text: Seeds were germinated on MS medium at 24°C, a relative humidity of 30% and under a 16 h photoperiod.

protocol.name: P-GSE53989-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted from 0.1 g of plant material using a Sigma-Aldrich Spectrum Plant Total RNA kit.

protocol.name: P-GSE53989-5
protocol.text: 100 ng of total RNA were used for amplification, which was performed with the GeneChip 3' IVT Express Kit (Cat # 901228, Lot# 0907014, Affymetrix). For fragmentation, 15 μg aRNA were used. aRNA were labeled with biotin. Biolitix AG (Witterswill, Switzerland).

protocol.name: P-GSE53989-6
protocol.text: Hybridization, washing and staining were performed according to the Affymetrix user manual. The hybridization cocktail was prepared using the Affymetrix GeneChip® Expression 3' Amplification Reagent Hybridization Controls (Cat# 900454; Lot# 4140132) and the Hybridization Module of GeneChip® Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit (Cat# 900720; Lot# 4139834) and mixed with aRNA samples. Hybridization was performed over night for 16 hours in the GeneChip® Hybridization Oven 640. Washing and staining of the arrays were done in the GeneChip®Fluidics Station 450. Biolitix AG (Witterswill, Switzerland).

protocol.name: P-GSE53989-7
protocol.text: Scanning was done with GeneChip® Scanner 3000 (Affymetrix). Biolitix AG (Witterswill, Switzerland).
